# Facilities Maintenance and Support Services at BATUS, Suffield

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** MX-22700747715
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** SD159908_77943 - Step 1
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-18T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **GC Category:** Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

## Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires facilities maintenance and support services for installations located at British Area Training Unit Suffield (BATUS) in Alberta. The contractor will be responsible for providing maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure within the defined property limits.

## Key Requirements

* Provide maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure.
* Ensure that buildings are maintained in a manner that does not cause deterioration beyond normal wear and tear.
* Be ready to commence providing services by the Service Commencement date specified in the Contract.
* The initial contract period will be three (3) years, with the possibility of two (2) additional two (2) year extensions for a total possible duration of seven (7) years.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria established in the Request for Proposals (RFP).
* Security Requirements for this project are identified in the RFP Documents.

## Tender Documents

* Tender documents are available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
* Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
